entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:26PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot And Dry Over Eastern Interior This Weekend... Hot and dry weather is expected for the Eastern Interior this weekend with temperatures rising into the 80s to lower 90s. Conditions are expected to become more smokey over the weekend as well. Temperature will remain the upper 70s and lower 80s on Monday.
